title: Due Date Calculator
metaDescription: Free Pregnancy Due Date Calculator - Calculate your due date using LMP, conception date, ultrasound, or IVF transfer date. Track your pregnancy milestones.

form.title: Calculate Your Due Date
form.lmpDateLabel: First Day of Last Menstrual Period
form.lmpHelper: The first day of your last period
form.cycleLengthHelper: Average length of your menstrual cycle (22-44 days)
form.ivfHelper: The age of the embryo when it was transferred

results.title: Your Pregnancy Timeline
results.disclaimer: Only about 4% of babies are born on their estimated due date. Most babies are born between 37-42 weeks of pregnancy. This calculator provides an estimate and should not replace professional medical advice.
